item.title: log / 230925-desire
item.description:
reflections with students on The Daodejing, Plato's Symposium, and Anne Carson's If Not, Winter: Fragments of Sappho:

"Beware too much desire. But desire."

item.title: log / 230919-bear
item.description:
"A chair is a chair until it's a bear."

  • George Berkeley, Treatise concerning the Principles of Human Knowledge
